author: panoskatsoulis
body:
Includes 2 fixes:
a) Fixes the L1TBMTFAlgoSelector SEGFAULT issue when there is no MP7 header to read by introducing a default configuration for the DQM Fix logic.
b) Fixes issue that lies in one BMTFUnpacker Constructor and leaves the 'isKalman' boolean undefined.
title: BMTF fixes for the AlgoSelector and the Unpacker
